name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jobbili: Boost Your Job Hunt with AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze job postings and compare with your CV in one click. Get tailored insights to stand out and land your dream job!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jobbili - Boost Your Job Hunt with AI 🚀

Looking for your dream job? 🧐 Jobbili makes it simple! Analyze job postings and compare them with your CV in just a click. Perfect for job seekers who want to stand out. 💼✨

✔ Quick CV Analysis
✔ Easy-to-Use
✔ Secure & Privacy-Friendly
✔ Boost Your Job Applications

No need to upload your CV repeatedly! Save time and focus on applying for the best jobs. 🔍💻

How it works?
1️⃣ Right-click anywhere on the page.
2️⃣ Choose "Analyze Job Posting."
3️⃣ Get instant insights tailored to your CV!

Get ready to land your next big opportunity! 🌟 Download Jobbili today and level up your job search. 📥🎯
